title: feMergeNode
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The feMergeNode SVG filter primitive defines the input for subsequent filter primitives.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Create a feMergeNode tag with input 'SourceGraphic'.

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: Create a feMergeNode tag with input 'BackgroundImage'.
